attributes.action: to stop getting rid of the buttons and plumes of her majestys foot guards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in the news ,there is a thing that the mod are going to change the button arrangement and get rid of the plume of the regiments of her majestys foot guards.with so many serving their country and dieing for it,it is a disgrace that they are even thinking about doing it.they say that it is the recession,but we all know it is a cost cutting exercise.what difference will it do,the only one is that people will not be able to see what proud regiment when they do there guards  and other ceromonial duties,so please sign this so we can put a stop to this stupid idea

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
